title: LBA Regional Hydrographic Data, 1-Degree, Release 2.2 (Cogley)
summary: This data set is a subset of Cogley's 1998 global hydrographic data set (GGHYDRO, Release 2.2). The subset was created for the study area of the Large Scale Biosphere-Atmosphere Experiment in Amazonia (LBA) in South America. The subset is organized into 19 files containing terrain type, stream frequency counts, major drainage basins, and annual water runoff for the LBA study area. The data are presented at a spatial resolution of 1-degree latitude by 1-degree longitude in ASCII GRID file format.
